title: upgrade from 5.0.3 to 5.0.6 failed
body:
### expected behaviour
system should be functional

### actual behaviour
system ist not accessable

### steps to reproduce
1. updated debian squeeze with apt-get update
2. rebooted after kernel update

### server configuration
operating system:
linux server7 2.6.32-5-xen-amd64 #1 smp mon feb 25 02:51:39 utc 2013 x86_64 gnu/linux

web server: 
apache/2.2.16 (debian)

database:
mysqld  ver 5.1.66-0+squeeze1 for debian-linux-gnu on x86_64 ((debian))

php version:
php 5.3.3-7+squeeze15 with suhosin-patch (cli) (built: mar  4 2013 13:11:17)

owncloud version:
in between 5.0.3 and 5.0.6

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 5.0.3 to 5.0.6","level":2,"time":1368377556}
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2 error: connect failed, _doconnect: [error message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n[native code: 2002]\n[native message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n)","level":4,"time":1368377556}
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2 error: connect failed, _doconnect: [error message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n[native code: 2002]\n[native message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n)","level":4,"time":1368377942}
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2 error: connect failed, _doconnect: [error message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n[native code: 2002]\n[native message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n)","level":4,"time":1368377942}
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2 error: connect failed, _doconnect: [error message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n[native code: 2002]\n[native message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n)","level":4,"time":1368378059}
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2 error: connect failed, _doconnect: [error message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n[native code: 2002]\n[native message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n)","level":4,"time":1368378059}
{"app":"core","message":"failed to get existing database structure for updating (mdb2 error: connect failed, _doconnect: [error message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n[native code: 2002]\n[native message: can't connect to local mysql server through socket '\/var\/lib\/mysql\/mysql.sock' (13)]\n)","level":4,"time":1368378059}
